short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ecolist changes your tabs into an eco tip everytime you open one. Find full lists here: https://github.com/benbyford/ecolist_data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple web extension to turn your web browsing into small reminders of environmental tips, issues and how we can all be part of the solution.
